about_the_game:
Welcome to the first DLCs for the Country Desert Simulator that allows you to drive a SUV into the desert. Realistic textures and sounds expect you.
One amazing feature expect you to create your own repaint for better looking. With the feature of Steam Workshop you can create it and publish it here on Steam Workshop.

Features

  • New Survival Charakter
  • Realistic driver feeling
  • Customizing repaints for the SUV
  • High resolution textures
detailed_description:
Welcome to the first DLCs for the Country Desert Simulator that allows you to drive a SUV into the desert. Realistic textures and sounds expect you.
One amazing feature expect you to create your own repaint for better looking. With the feature of Steam Workshop you can create it and publish it here on Steam Workshop.

Features

  • New Survival Charakter
  • Realistic driver feeling
  • Customizing repaints for the SUV
  • High resolution textures

name: Country Desert Simulator | Addon SUV

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce or AMD Radeon
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.5GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
